properties.EventComments: A road rebuild will take place from Monday 16 September to Friday 25 October between 8am and 4pm. Temporary speed restrictions will remain in place until the road has been swept and line marked. Please drive with care. Allow 20 minutes extra travel time.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour for all traffic to/from Kawerau use SH34 (Kawerau Rd West) to/from SH30 (Rotoma end of town).

properties.Name: Road Work: SH 99 West of Wallacetown

properties.EventComments: Due to major renewal works SH1 between Piarere and Tirau will be fully closed nightly, from 7pm to 6am, every Sun to Thu (5 nights per week) between Sun 29 September and Thu 17 October, subject to weather conditions. SH1 will reopen daily and on weekends. Allow extra time for required night-time detours.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Use SH29 and SH27 (via Hinuera) in both directions.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Piarere to Tirau

properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing works taking place, SH3 Ohaupo Road will be closed to through traffic between Lambert Court and Mount View Crescent overnight from Thursday 10 October between 8pm and 6am Sunday to Thursday nights only for 10 nights
properties.AlternativeRoute:
Via Lambert Court, MacDonald Road, Saxbys Road, Deanwell Avenue, Collins Road, Prisk Street, Mount View Court to re-join SH3.
HPMV's, heavy and over dimensional vehicles will be stacked and released at regular intervals
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 3 Glenview, Hamilton

properties.EventComments: Due to emergency under-slip repair works, this section of road will be closed in both directions on Sunday to Thursday nights between 9pm and 4am from Monday 7th October for approximately 10 weeks. Plan your journey accordingly avoiding travel during these times. For access over the hill during these times, there will be one crossing per night. Please visit www.nzta.govt.nz/remutaka prior to the closures to apply for a booking.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour via SH1, SH57, Cambridge Avenue, Mulgrave Street, Salisbury Street Saddle Road and SH2. Please note these detour routes will add approximately 3 and a half hours to your journey time.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Kaitoke to Featherston (Remutaka Hill)

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Matamau, near the intersection with Factory Road
properties.EventComments: Due to paving works, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place on weekdays (And when required on Saturday) between 6am and 6pm from Tuesday 1st October to Wednesday 30th October. Outside of these hours, there will be a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 10 minute delays. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Matamau, near the intersection with Factory Road

properties.EventComments: Due to power pole replacement works, this section of road will be closed to northbound traffic on Tuesdays and Thursday between 9am and 5pm from Thursday 7th November to Tuesday 26th November. At times, southbound will also be closed for short periods of time (Up to 15 minutes). Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Follow sign posted detours on site.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Henley to Allanton

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Rewatu Road to Taneatua Road
properties.EventComments: Sealing work on the Pekatahi Bridge will take place on Wed, 16 Oct for one day, between 9:30 AM and 4:30 PM. Expect delays of 20 minutes. A stop/ go and stop/ stop will be in place. Please follow instruction of crew on site.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 2 Rewatu Road to Taneatua Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 29 Gargan Road to Redwood Lane
properties.EventComments: Barrier installation work will take place on SH29 from Gargan Road to Redwood Lane. Works will be completed over one night on Monday 14 October and Tuesday 15 October between hours of 07:00pm to 05:00am - weather permitting. Lane diversions and Stop/Go with 30kph temporary speed limits will be in place during these hours. Expect delays during these hours.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 29 Gargan Road to Redwood Lane

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Domain Road to Paengaroa RAB
properties.EventComments: Due to road works, this section of road will be closed east bound direction from Monday 4 November to Tuesday 5 November  between 8pm and 6;00am. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel. There will be 70kph TSL outside of these times. East bound traffic to follow detours in place. Please note these works are weather dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour via Te Puke Highway east bound
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Domain Road to Paengaroa RAB

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Paengaroa RAB to Domain Road
properties.EventComments: Due to road works, this section of road will be closed west bound direction from Tuesday 5 November to Wednesday 6 November between 8pm and 6am. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel. There will be 70kph TSL outside of these times. West bound traffic to follow detours in place. Please note these works are weather dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.AlternativeRoute: West bound diverted to Te Puke Highway back to SH2
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Paengaroa RAB to Domain Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 33 Rotorua Boundary to All Port Road
properties.EventComments: Resurfacing work will take place on SH33 from Rotorua Boundary to Allport Road. Sealing works will be completed over 2 weeks from Tuesday 15 October to Friday 25 October between hours of 07:00am to 5:00pm - weather permitting. Stop/Go with 30kph temporary speed limits will be in place during these hours. Expect delays during night-time hours. After these hours temporary speed limits remain in place for loose chip and traffic management monitoring.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 33 Rotorua Boundary to All Port Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 1 Levin, between the intersections of Tyne Street and York Stret
properties.EventComments: Due to maintenance hole and reseal works, there will be a Stop/Go and a 30km/h temporary speed restrictions in place on Thursday 17th October night between 6pm and 6am. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 10 minute delays.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 1 Levin, between the intersections of Tyne Street and York Stret

properties.LocationArea: SH 94 Mossburn, near the intersection with Bath Street
properties.EventComments: Due to road reconstruction and surfacing works, there will be temporary traffic signals and 30km/h speed restrictions in place on weekdays between 6am and 8pm from Monday 14th  October to Friday 22nd November. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 10 minute delays.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 94 Mossburn, near the intersection with Bath Street

properties.LocationArea: SH 84 Wanaka, at the Anderson Road Roundabout
properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing works, there will be lane closures and 30km/h temporary speed restrictions in place and access in and out of Anderson Road will be closed from Sunday 3rd November at 8pm to Friday 8th November at 5:30am. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 10 minute delays travelling through this area during this time.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 84 Wanaka, at the Anderson Road Roundabout

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Old Tauranga Road to Mathers Road
properties.EventComments: Resurfacing work will take place on SH2 from Old Tauranga Road to Mathers Road. Rehab and sealing works will be completed over 8 weeks from Thursday 10 October to Wednesday 4 December between hours of 06:00am to 06:00pm - weather permitting. Lane diversions and Stop/Go with 30kph temporary speed limits will be in place 24 hours for duration of works. Expect delays at all times.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Mathers Road Closed, residents to access SH2 via Trigg Road
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Old Tauranga Road to Mathers Road

properties.EventComments: Due to bridge jacking and repair works, there will be Stop/Go traffic control in place on Monday and Wednesday nights between 7pm and 5am from Wednesday 14th August until the end of October.  Outside of these hours there will be temporary speed restrictions in place 24/7. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 30 minute delays during night works.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 1 Norwood (Selwyn RIver Bridge)

properties.LocationArea: SH 94 Te Anau to Milford (Milford Road)
properties.EventComments: The Milford Road has now moved to an Avalanche hazard for the winter. Information, road restrictions or closures can be found on www.nzta.govt.nz
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 94 Te Anau to Milford (Milford Road)

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Tainui Rd to Pongakawa Station Rd
properties.EventComments: Resurfacing work will take place on SH2 from Tainui Rd to Pongakawa Station Rd. Rehab and sealing works will be completed over 8 weeks from Monday 19 August to Thursday 24 October between hours of 06:00am to 06:00pm - weather permitting. Lane diversions and Stop/Go with 30kph temporary speed limits will be in place during these hours. Expect delays 15 to 30 mins during peak times. After these hours temporary speed limits remain in place for loose chip and traffic management monitoring.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Light vehicles only. Left at Pongakawa Station Rd, right at Old Coach Rd, right at Maniatutu Rd to return to SH2.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Tainui Rd to Pongakawa Station Rd

properties.EventComments: Due to vegetation removal and site works, the right turning lane on this off-ramp will be closed 24/7 from Monday 14th October for approximately 3 weeks. Road users are advised to take extra care.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Right turning traffic on to Kennedy Road, turn left and turn around at the Taradale Road Roundabout.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 2 Kennedy Road Off-Ramp, Napier

properties.EventComments: Due to maintenance work, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place along this route from Wednesday 8th October to Thursday 31st October between 6am and 6pm. Take extra care.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 6 Kaituna to Havelock

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Warrington Road to Clark Cross Road
properties.EventComments: A road rehabilitation will take place from Mon, 16 Sep to Fri, 1 Nov, between 7:30am to 4:30pm each weekday. Temporary traffic management will be in place with a four-way stop/ go. Expect minor delays and follow the speed retrictions in place.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 2 Warrington Road to Clark Cross Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 73 Otira to Arthurs Pass Village (Rock Shelter)
properties.EventComments: Due to an excavator lift at the rock shelter, this section of road will be closed in both directions on Monday 14th October between 10am and 2pm. Plan your journey accordingly and avoid travel during this time if possible. Please note these works are dependent on various factors and maybe postponed at short notice.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour via SH7 Lewis Pass or wait for road to reopen at 2pm. Please note this detour will add approximately 40 minutes to your journey if traveling between Greymouth and Christchurch.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 73 Otira to Arthurs Pass Village (Rock Shelter)

properties.LocationArea: SH 1 Hornby, at the intersection of Waterloo Road
properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing works, there will be lane closures with 30km/h temporary speed restrictions and right turns in and out of Waterloo Road will be closed on Wednesday 16th October and Thursday 17th October between 6pm and 6am. Road users are advised to take extra care
properties.AlternativeRoute: For access to and from Waterloo Road, follow sign posted detours on site.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 1 Hornby, at the intersection of Waterloo Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 6 Rai Valley to Rai Saddle
properties.EventComments: Due to a resilience works, there will be Stop/Go traffic control with 30km/h speed restrictions in place in various locations through this area 24/7 from Monday 14th October at 8am to Friday 22nd November at 5pm (Excluding Friday 25th October at 12pm to Tuesday 29th October at 12am). Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 30 minute delays travelling through this area.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 6 Rai Valley to Rai Saddle

properties.EventComments: Due to slip maintenance activities taking place on SH31 near Harbour Road, traffic management will be in place until Friday 25 October 6pm
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 31 Oparau

properties.EventComments: Due to enabling work for the SH2 Hawkes Bay Expressway 4-laning Project, the Northbound Offramp will be closed to right-turning traffic from Tuesday 15th October to Monday March 3rd 2025 between 6am and 4pm, Monday to Saturday. A 50km/h speed restriction will also be in place.  The cycle lanes will be closed and cyclists directed onto the footpath. Plan your journey accordingly and take extra care travelling through this area.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Napier, Hawkes Bay Expressway

properties.LocationArea: SH 3 Brixton, at the intersection with Waitara Road
properties.EventComments: Due to roundabout construction, there will be various traffic management with temporary speed restrictions in place and the right turn to Raleigh Street will be closed from Monday 13th May until further notice. SH3 from Waitara Road will be closed from September 15th until late November.  Road users are advised to take extra care.
properties.AlternativeRoute:
Please note access to Raleigh Street and Tate Road will remain open to residents during these works.
To access SH3 from Waitara Road, use Kairau Road East to Richmond Road.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 3 Brixton, at the intersection with Waitara Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 3 Whanganui between Smithfield Road and Jackson Street
properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing work, the road will be down to one lane, southbound, with a 30Km/h speed restriction from Wednesday 16th October to Friday 18th October between 7am to 7pm. Plan your journey accordingly and take extra care travelling through this area.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 3 Whanganui between Smithfield Road and Jackson Street

properties.LocationArea: SH 35 Ruatoria, between the intersections of Bridge Street and Thatcher Road
properties.EventComments: Due to bridge repair works, this section of road will be closed in both directions on Wednesday 23rd October between 12pm and 12:30pm. Plan your journey accordingly, avoiding travel during these times if possible.
properties.AlternativeRoute: No detour available. Expect up to 30 minute delays waiting for the road to reopen.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 35 Ruatoria, between the intersections of Bridge Street and Thatcher Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 35 Tokomaru Bay to Tolaga Bay
properties.EventComments: Due to slope reconstruction and retaining wall works, there will be a Stop/Go with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place on an unsealed road surface between 6am and 6pm. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 5 minute delays.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 35 Tokomaru Bay to Tolaga Bay

properties.LocationArea: SH 1 12km south of Cheviot (Benmore Stream Bridge)
properties.EventComments: Due to pavement repair works, there ll be a Stop/Go with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place from Monday 14th October to Wednesday 16th October between 7:30am and 5pm. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 15 minute delays travelling through this area during these times.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 1 12km south of Cheviot (Benmore Stream Bridge)

properties.EventComments: Due to slip recovery and pavement repair works, there is temporary traffic management, including temporary traffic lights and 30km/h temporary speed restriction at multiple locations along this route. Road users are advised to take extra care and expect delays along this route.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Kotemaori to Tangoio

properties.EventComments: Due to major renewal works between Tirohanga Rd and Tutukau Rd, SH1 will be open under stop/go traffic management until Fri 18 October, subject to weather conditions. Allow extra time for expected delays through the area.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Atiamuri to Oruanui

properties.LocationArea: SH 57 Shannon, at the intersection of Plimmer Terrace
properties.EventComments: Due to patch repairs, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction from Thursday 17th October to Thursday October 24th between 6pm and 6am. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 57 Shannon, at the intersection of Plimmer Terrace

properties.LocationArea: SH 1 Sanson, at the intersection of Burt Street
properties.EventComments: Due to patch repairs, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction from Tuesday 15th October to Thursday October 17th between 6pm and 6am. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 1 Sanson, at the intersection of Burt Street

properties.EventComments: Due to slip repairs taking place on SH37 near Fullerton Road, traffic management will be in place until 18 October 6pm
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 37 Waitomo

properties.EventComments: Due to paving works, the Green Island Offramp will be closed on Tuesday 22nd October and Wednesday 23rd October from 8pm to 6am. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour via SH1, Westland Street and Main South Road.
properties.Name: Scheduled Road Work: SH 1 Green Island Offramp

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Watahanui Lane to Otamarakau valley Road
properties.EventComments: Resurfacing work will take place on SH2 from Watahanui Lane to Otumarakau Valley Road. Rehab and sealing works will be completed over 9 weeks from Monday 9 September to Thursday 24 October between hours of 06:00am to 06:00pm - weather permitting. Lane diversions and Stop/Go with 30kph temporary speed limits will be in place during these hours. Expect delays during daytime hours. After these hours temporary speed limits remain in place for loose chip and traffic management monitoring.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Watahanui Lane to Otamarakau valley Road

properties.EventComments: Due to road rebuild works taking place on SH26 between Platt Road and Friedlander Road, the westbound lane (towards Hamilton) will be closed 24/7 from 9am Monday 30 September for 8 weeks. The eastbound lane will remain open at all times with a 30 km/hr temporary speed limit in place.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour route: via Tauwhare Road and Platt Road to re-join SH26
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 26 Eureka

properties.LocationArea: SH 73 Christchurch between Lunns Road and Curletts Road Overpass
properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing works, there will be a northbound lane closure from 6pm to 12am and a full closure from 12am to 6am on Monday 14th October. A  30km/h speed restriction will also be in place. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Use Barrington Street to Whiteleigh Ave and then onto Blenheim Road.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 73 Christchurch between Lunns Road and Curletts Road Overpass

properties.EventComments: Due to slip clearing work, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place 24/7 until October. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 35 Turihaua Beach

properties.LocationArea: SH 3 Midhurst between Rutland and Denbigh Roads
properties.EventComments: Due to road reconstruction work, a lane shift with a 30km/h speed restriction will be in place from Wednesday 2nd of October for approximately 7 to 8 weeks. Work will take place between 6am and 7pm but traffic management will be in place 24/7. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 3 Midhurst between Rutland and Denbigh Roads

properties.LocationArea: SH 3 Onaero between Waiau Road and Kapikari Road
properties.EventComments: Due to pavement repairs, there will be Stop/Go traffic management at two sites with a 30km/h speed restriction from Monday 14th October to Friday 22nd November between 6am and 7pm, Monday to Saturday. Plan your journey accordingly and expect delays of approximately 5 to 10 minutes. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 3 Onaero between Waiau Road and Kapikari Road

properties.EventComments: Due to road renewal works, there will a Stop/Go with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place in various locations on weekdays between 7am and 6pm from Tuesday 1st October. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 20 minute delays travelling through this area during these times.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Conway Bluff to Waipara

properties.EventComments: Due to pavement repair work, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction from Monday 30th September to Thursday 14th November. Take extra care and expect some delays.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 73 West of Springfield

properties.EventComments: Due to road reconstruction works, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place on weekdays from Monday 30th September to Friday 18th October between 6am and 8pm. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 6 Centre Bush

properties.EventComments: Due to recovery, safety improvement, and pavement repair works, there is temporary traffic management, including temporary traffic lights and speed restrictions at multiple locations along this route. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 20 minute delays.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 5 Eskdale to Waipunga

properties.LocationArea: SH 35 Tokomaru Bay to Te Araroa
properties.EventComments: Due to uneven road surface and drop out repair works, there is a priority give way, traffic signals and speed restrictions in place 24/7 until further notice. Plan your journey accordingly and expect up to 25 minute delays.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 35 Tokomaru Bay to Te Araroa

properties.EventComments: Due to road reconstruction works, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place on weekdays only from Monday 23rd September to  Friday 4th October between 8am and 5pm. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 8 Fruitlands

properties.EventComments: Due to fibre installation works, there will be a Stop/Go with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place on weekdays between 7am and 7pm until Friday 25th October. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 73 Springfield to Sheffield

properties.EventComments: Due to water cutting and duct installation works, there will be a Stop/Go with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place in various locations on weekdays between 7am and 6am (Overnight). Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Waipapa Bay to Peketa

properties.EventComments: Due to chip sealing works, this section of road between High Street South and  Robinson Road will be closed in both directions on Saturday 19th October between 7am and 5pm. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Detour via via Robinson Road, Main Road Lower Moutere, Wildman Road and High Street South. Please note this detour will add approximately 10 minutes to your journey time.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 60 1km south of Motueka (Mariri Causeway)

properties.LocationArea: SH 2 Dannevirke, south of Tamaki River Road
properties.EventComments: Due to multiple potholes, there is a southbound lane closure and a 70 km/h speed restriction in place. Take extra care.
properties.Name: Road Hazard: SH 2 Dannevirke, south of Tamaki River Road

properties.EventComments: Road open -  Drive with care
properties.Name: Road Hazard: SH N/A Ruapehu, Bruce Road

properties.LocationArea: SH 80 Pukaki to Mt Cook (Aoraki Mt Cook Highway)
properties.EventComments: Due to an uneven road surface, a temporary speed restriction of 50km/h will remain in place.  Please take extra care when driving through this area.
properties.Name: Road Hazard: SH 80 Pukaki to Mt Cook (Aoraki Mt Cook Highway)

properties.LocationArea: SH 60 Takaka, between Waitapu Wharf Road and Rangihaeata Road
properties.EventComments: Due to severe weather damage and ongoing under-slip repairs, there is 50 km/h temporary speed restriction in place. Road users are advised to take extra care along this route.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 60 Takaka, between Waitapu Wharf Road and Rangihaeata Road

properties.LocationArea: SH N/A Woodville to Ballance (Ballance Valley Road)
properties.EventComments: Due to a washout, Ballance Valley Road is closed. Avoid the area or delay your journey if possible.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH N/A Woodville to Ballance (Ballance Valley Road)

properties.EventComments: Due to road reconstruction works, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place on weekdays only from Monday 16th September to Wednesday 16th October between 8am and 6pm. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 6 Queensberry, near Gladsmuir Road

properties.EventComments: Due to resurfacing work in this area during the day, Stop/Go traffic management and speed restrictions will be in place 24/7. Expect delays.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 14 Tangiteroria

properties.LocationArea: SH 50 Tikokino, between Gwavas Road and Salisbury Road intersection
properties.EventComments: Due to roadworks, there is stop/go traffic management with a 30km/h temporary speed restriction in place. Please stop on request and take extra care.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 50 Tikokino, between Gwavas Road and Salisbury Road intersection

properties.EventComments: Due to remedial and safety works SH1 through the Taupiri to Horotiu area is reduced to 1 lane in each direction via contraflow, with reduced speed limits. Allow extra time for delays, especially during peak travel times and holiday periods.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 1 Taupiri to Horotiu

properties.EventComments: Due to remedial works where SH1C and SH1 merge between Horotiu and Taupiri, SH1C is closed to northbound traffic after the Lake Rd off-ramp with a detour required to travel north. This closure is in place 24/7 until November. Southbound lanes are unaffected.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Northbound traffic must exit at the Northern Interchange (to Lake Rd) and go south on SH1 to turn around at the Rototuna Interchange (Resolution Dr) and proceed north on SH1.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 1C Northern Interchange, Northbound

properties.EventComments: Due to various works, this local road will be closed in both directions between SH75 and Bibiana Street 24/7 from Monday 10th June for approximately 20 weeks.  Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH N/A Aidanfield Drive, Aidanfield

properties.EventComments: Due to bridge repairs. there is a temporary bridge with priority give way, vehicle restrictions and speed restrictions in place 24/7 until further notice. The bridge is limited to general access and 50MAX vehicles only and to overweight and overdimension vehicles by permit only. For more information refer to  https://www.nzta.govt.nz/media-releases/bridge-weight-restrictions-there-to-adhere-to/#:~:text=Hikuwai%20Bailey%20bridge%20on%20State,vehicle%20at%20a%20time%20policy.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 35 Mangatuna (Hikuwai Bailey Bridge)

properties.EventComments: Due to an underslip, there is Stop/Go traffic management, under traffic lights, with lane reduction and a 30km temporary speed restriction in place. Repair work will start on Monday 23rd August between 7am and 5pm and is expected to be completed by the end of December. Traffic management will be in place 24/7. Plan your journey accordingly and take extra care when travelling through the area.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 60 Takaka Hill

properties.EventComments: Due to pavement resealing work, there will be Stop/Go traffic management with a 30km/h speed restriction in place on weekdays from Monday 12th August to Friday 29th November, between 8am and 5pm. Allow extra time for your travel. Please note these works are weather-dependent and may be postponed at short notice.
properties.Name: Road Work: SH 43 Tangarakau Gorge

properties.EventComments: Due to tree-felling works on this route, there will be multiple Stop/Go sites with 30 km/h temporary speed restrictions in place Monday to Friday between 5am and 7pm until approximately the end of October. Plan your journey accordingly and expect delays of up to 20 minutes travelling through this area during these times.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 6 Whangamoa

properties.LocationArea: SH 6 Marlborough, between the intersections of Godfrey Road and Jacksons Road, eastbound
properties.EventComments: Due to roundabout project works, this section of road is closed to eastbound traffic from Monday 15th July until December. Plan your journey accordingly allowing extra time for travel.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Light vehicles, detour via Old Renwick Road and Jacksons Road. heavy vehicles, detour via Anglesea Street and Boyce Street.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 6 Marlborough, between the intersections of Godfrey Road and Jacksons Road, eastbound

properties.EventComments: Due to multiple large slips and dropouts, SH1 is closed between Kitchen Rd and Makene Rd through the Mangamuka Gorge. Please use SH10 until further notice and allow extra journey time.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 1 Mangamuka Gorge

properties.EventComments: For safety reasons, SH1B (Telephone Rd) remains closed between Holland Rd and Puketaha Rd while the long-term future of this intersection is decided. Allow extra time for the short detour.
properties.AlternativeRoute: Southbound traffic turn left onto Seddon Rd, right onto Waverley Rd, right onto Holland Rd, left onto SH1B. Reverse for northbound traffic.
properties.Name: Road Closure: SH 1B Telephone Rd/Holland Rd intersection

properties.EventComments: Due to installation of Rangiuru Park interchange, lane closures will be in place in both directions at all times between the Toll Bridge and Maketu Road with a 70km/h tempoary speed restriction.
properties.Name: Area Warning: SH 2 Paengaroa to Kaituna River (TEL)

properties.LocationArea: South Island Regional and District Council Websites
properties.Content:
For updates on all local roads go to the local council website: 

TASMAN REGION:

  • Tasman District Council: https://www.tasman.govt.nz/

NELSON REGION:

  • Nelson City Council: http://www.nelson.govt.nz/

MARLBOROUGH REGION:

  • Marlborough District Council: https://www.marlborough.govt.nz/

WEST COAST REGION:

  • Buller District Council: https://bullerdc.govt.nz/
  • Grey District Council: https://www.greydc.govt.nz
  • Westland District Council: https://www.westlanddc.govt.nz/

CANTERBURY REGION:

  • Kaikoura District Council : https://www.kaikoura.govt.nz/
  • Hurunui District Council: https://www.hurunui.govt.nz/
  • Waimakariri District Council: https://www.waimakariri.govt.nz/home
  • Christchurch City Council: https://ccc.govt.nz/
  • Selwyn District Council: https://www.selwyn.govt.nz/
  • Ashburton District Council: https://www.ashburtondc.govt.nz/
  • Timaru District Council: https://www.timaru.govt.nz/
  • Mackenzie District Council: http://www.mackenzie.govt.nz/
  • Waimate District Council: https://www.waimatedc.govt.nz/
  • Waitaki District Council: https://www.waitaki.govt.nz/

OTAGO REGION:

  • Waitaki District Council: https://www.waitaki.govt.nz/
  • Queenstown-Lakes District Council: https://www.qldc.govt.nz/
  • Central Otago District Council: https://www.codc.govt.nz/
  • Dunedin City Council: https://www.dunedin.govt.nz/
  • Clutha District Council: https://www.cluthadc.govt.nz/

SOUTHLAND REGION:

  • Southland District Council: https://www.southlanddc.govt.nz
  • Gore District Council: https://www.goredc.govt.nz
  • Invercargill City Council: https://icc.govt.nz/

[image src="/assets/Traffic-Updates/South-Island-Councils-Regions-map.PNG" id="9439" width="600" height="849" class="leftAlone ss-htmleditorfield-file image"]
properties.Name: News: South Island Regional and District Council Websites

properties.Content:
FINAL UPDATE THU 17 OCT 2019

Kuaotunu River bridge reopens

Our contractors have done a fantastic job to get the bridge opened ahead of schedule, and more than a week before Labour weekend, despite the heavy rain and strong winds that battered the area earlier this week. Traffic management remains in place, including a 30km/h speed restriction.

Please note that, weather dependent, the bridge will need to close again for the day on Monday (21 Oct) to carry out resurfacing works.

---------------

 

UPDATE TUE 08 OCT 2019

Repairing Kuaotunu bridge to reconnect SH25 

Work to repair the Kuaotunu Bridge on SH25 Coromandel after last month’s storm is progressing well, with the bridge expected to reopen within the next couple of weeks.

The repair team has finished driving the piles on the northern side of the bridge and has switched to the southern side. Once all the piles have been driven they will need to be cut to size and the bridge abutments filled with concrete before work to reinstate the bridge deck can begin.

“We understand that these works are frustrating for local residents and those who travel to the area often, however, our contractors are working as hard as they can to repair the damage as quickly and efficiently as possible,” says Transport Agency Waikato Systems Manager Karen Boyt.  

The Transport Agency has joined together with Thames Coromandel District Council to provide a free shuttle bus service from Kuaotunu to Whitianga every day while the bridge is closed.

The Go Kiwi shuttle departs from outside the Kuaotunu fire station, at 7:30am and 8:30am and then returns from Whitianga at 4:30pm and 5:30pm. From Wednesday 9 October there will also be a lunchtime bus leaving Whitianga at 11.30 and Kuaotunu at 12pm. 

Anyone travelling in the area should check our Journey Planner, www.journeys.nzta.govt.nz or call 0800 44 44 49 before leaving for the most up to date information. 

[image src="/assets/8e66b60fd1/NZTA-3.jpg" id="1023" width="657" height="507" class="leftAlone ss-htmleditorfield-file image" title="NZTA 3"]

[image src="/assets/5b38db22be/nzta-2.jpg" id="1022" width="657" height="586" class="leftAlone ss-htmleditorfield-file image" title="nzta 2"]

 

 ---------------

Following an assessment after recent heavy rain, the SH25 Kuaotunu River bridge has been closed, for around five weeks, to repair weather damage.

We understand the frustration this may cause for those who live in or travel to the area often, however our contractors are working as hard as they can to repair the damage as quickly and efficiently as possible.

During this time detours will be clearly signposted via either SH25A and SH25 or SH25 Thames Coast Road.

 [image src="/assets/dd1a4446a4/Kuaotunu-IMG_STOP.jpg" id="1019" width="251" height="303" class="ss-htmleditorfield-file image right" title="Kuaotunu IMG STOP"]
  • Residents south of Blackjack Road will need to access Kuaotunu from Whitianga.
  • Residents west of the bridge will only have vehicle access from the Coromandel side.
  • Pedestrians will be able to cross the river via a separate, existing walk bridge. 

We hope to have the bridge open again by Labour Weekend, however, this is weather dependant. We will keep the community updated, and thank you for your patience during this time.

 

UPDATE TUE 24 SEP 2019

Repair works to SH25 Kuaotonu River Bridge began on Sunday 22 Sep, following an early morning karakia by local Iwi. Our contractors have started to remove the wooden deck after stripping back the seal layers. The seal and deck have been removed by hand, and efforts made to protect the environment by installing a platform below the deck.

[image src="/assets/b241894b48/Kuaotunu-IMG_6039.jpg" id="1018" width="733" height="550" class="leftAlone ss-htmleditorfield-file image" title="Kuaotunu IMG 6039"]
properties.Name: Road Work: Kuaotunu River Bridge Repairs
